Detailed Description

The OrderedEventBus class is a simple and fast IEventBus implemention which processes event in the delivery order.

If you do not need the event processed in the delivery order, use SimpleEventBus instead.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

inline

The constructor of OrderedEventBus.

Parameters
maxPendingEventNumberThe maximum pending event number which does not yet dispatched

Member Function Documentation

void EventBus.OrderedEventBus.Deregister ( object  handler)
inline

Deregister event handlers belong to the handler instance. One handler instance may have many event handler methods. These methods have EventSubscriberAttribute contract and exactly one parameter.

Parameters
handlerThe instance of event handler class

Implements EventBus.IEventBus.

TimeSpan  dispatchDelay 
)
inline

Post an event to the event bus, dispatched after the specific time.

If you do not need the event processed in the delivery order, use SimpleEventBus instead.

Parameters
eventObjectThe event object
dispatchDelayThe delay time before dispatch this event

Implements EventBus.IEventBus.

void EventBus.OrderedEventBus.Register ( object  handler)
inline

Register event handlers in the handler instance. One handler instance may have many event handler methods. These methods have EventSubscriberAttribute contract and exactly one parameter.

If you do not need the event processed in the delivery order, use SimpleEventBus instead.

Parameters
handlerThe instance of event handler class

Implements EventBus.IEventBus.
